body:
SOLERS is a fast growing German invested manufacturer for electronic and mechanical components, with a focus of tailored cable assemblies, PCB boards and control equipment. Core competence of the company is creative engineering.Our engineering center and manufacturing plant located in Bacau, Calea Republicii 205, is looking for a high caliber individual for the following position:  Cost & Design Engineer. 

Main Responsibilities and Duties:
1. Liaise with sales department to provide technical solutions fulfilling specification requirements provided by customers
2. Sourcing of suppliers for standard components and customized components
3. Follow up with suppliers for quotations 
4. Cost calculation of the components in form of initial BOM setting and create the product costs
5. Produce engineering drawings and bills of materials

Requirement:
1.University degree in mechanical or electrical/ electronic engineering
2. Good command of English in order to communicate with the overseas management
3. Experience in related manufacturing capacity
4. Advanced knowledge of AutoCAD 2D and basic knowledge of 3D Design (e.g. SolidWorks, Inventor)
5. Reference and subsequent consent for verification of qualification and work experience is required.

Remuneration & Benefit:
1.Attractive result oriented package.
